name: In Your Dreams
description:
What starts out as just another day for Alycia ends with the disappearance of her young son and the start of the worst time of her life. Her dreams haunted by a familiar animatronic who offers to make her a deal- an offer she may have no choice but to accept if she ever wants to see her son again.

An RPGmaker horror story, this game is made by a single dev (who you can follow on Twitter @arctosofficial) on an old laptop and they hope you like it. Check out their other games and be sure to leave a comment!
